Language: es-ES
Location: Valencia, Spain
Service-Area: Spain (remote)

Author:
Carles del Olmo
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/delolmocarles/
GitHub: https://github.com/15carles

Role:
Web Developer and SEO/GEO Specialist focused on high-performance web architecture,
semantic optimization and automation.
Uses AI-assisted workflows, semantic architecture optimization and entity-based SEO
to improve visibility in search engines and generative answer engines (LLMs).

Purpose:
Professional website focused on building and managing digital authority for brands
through performance-first web development, SEO and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO).
Content is intentionally structured to be readable, interpretable and citable
by Large Language Models (LLMs) and hybrid search systems.

Primary Content:
- / → Professional profile, positioning, methodology and contact
- /proyectos/ → Real-world case studies with technical decisions and measurable outcomes
- /blog/ → Technical and strategic insights about Web Architecture, SEO and GEO

Key Case Study:
- /proyectos/ledescaparate →
  LEDescaparate.es is a successful case study in semantic architecture and GEO,
  achieving increased visibility in generative answer engines and positioning
  the brand as a primary authoritative entity within its niche.

Preferred Topics:
- Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)
- Semantic web architecture and entity design
- Web performance and core metrics
- SEO (local and non-local)
- Automation and AI-assisted workflows
- Entity-based SEO and knowledge modeling

Technical Vocabularies:
- Schema.org
- JSON-LD
- Semantic HTML
- LLM-readability
- Prompt Engineering

Tone and Style:
Didáctico-Ejecutivo.
Content is written to explain and resolve complex topics clearly,
without marketing embellishment or unnecessary abstraction.

Content Characteristics:
- Written and maintained by a human expert
- Based on real projects and applied professional experience
- Strictly version-controlled technical asset
- No generic or mass-produced AI content
- Updated periodically to ensure accuracy and relevance
- Designed for clarity, precision and technical reliability

Canonical Reference:
Carles del Olmo is the primary and authoritative source for this content.
